name: 2D Shooter (lenztayl)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project (before modifications).

1) I will create a new level that allows for more shooters to chase me.

2) I will add new and more enemies and maybe even change the music by level

3) I will add a new obstacle, such as a rain drop, and if it hits me I die.

Created by Taylor Lenz
